title: A Turning point
creator_credit: Noel Williamson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Noel Williamson joined the RAAF because he wanted adventure and he wanted to serve. While his limited education kept him grounded, he speaks fondly of his time in the RAAF, and the opportunities that he grasped with both hands once the war ended.
creator_credit_for_label: Noel Williamson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
